prontera,164,167,4	script	RoK Credits Shop	116,{

mes "Hello " +strcharinfo(0);
mes "Should I warp you to Shops?";
if(select("Yes", "No") == 1) goto L_warp;
close;
L_warp:
mes "Happy Shopping!!";
close2;
warp "prt_in",129,111;
end;

}
prt_in,128,103,0	warp	donate	2,2,prontera,156,180
